SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! printing the command formed : PRINT "EXECUTING CMD : &UC4RB_RUN_CMD#"
: SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" SET OSB_HOME=&UC4RB_OSB_HOME# call &UC4RB_OSB_WEBLOGIC_HOME#\server\bin\setWLSEnv.cmd
IF %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 ( set CLASSPATH=%OSB_HOME%\lib\sb-kernel-api.jar;%OSB_HOME%\modules\com.bea.common.configfwk_1.7.0.0.jar;%OSB_HOME%\lib\sb-kernel-impl.jar;%OSB_HOME%\lib\alsb.jar;%CLASSPATH% ) ELSE ( echo "ERROR: Unable to set WLS environment." SET ERROR=1 ) IF %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 ( &UC4RB_RUN_CMD# ) ELSE ( echo "ERROR: Unable to set the CLASSPATH." SET ERROR=1 ) IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 ( echo "ERROR: Unable to run the command." SET ERROR=1 ) : CASE "UNIX" OSB_HOME=&UC4RB_OSB_HOME# . &UC4RB_OSB_WEBLOGIC_HOME#/server/bin/setWLSEnv.sh
if [ "$?" -eq 0 ] then export CLASSPATH=$CLASSPATH:$OSB_HOME/lib/sb-kernel-api.jar:$OSB_HOME/modules/com.bea.common.configfwk_1.7.0.0.jar:$OSB_HOME/lib/sb-kernel-impl.jar:$OSB_HOME/lib/alsb.jar error=$? else echo "ERROR: Unable to set WLS environment." error=1 fi
if [ "$error" -eq 0 ] then &UC4RB_RUN_CMD# error=$? else echo "ERROR: Unable to set the CLASSPATH." error=1 fi
if [ "$error" -ne 0 ] then echo "ERROR: Unable to run the command." error=1 fi : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
